sections.text: agnirnaḥ̍ pAtu kRuttikAḥ|nakṣa̍traM̍ dEvamindriyam|idamA̍sAM̍ ~Mvicakṣaṇam|havirAsaM juhOtana||yasya̍ BAnti# raśmayO yasya# kEtavaḥ|yasyEmA̍ viśvA BuvanAni̍ sarvA̱|sa kRuttikABiraBi̍ sam~MvasAnaḥ|agnirnO̍# dEvaḥ suvitE̍ dadhAtu||prajApa̍tE̍ rOhiṇI vEtu̍ patnI̱|viśvarUpA̍ bRuhatI citraBAnuḥ|1̍ (10)

sA nO# yajñasya# suvitE dadhAtu|yathA̍ jIvEma̍ śaradaḥ savIrAḥ||rOhiṇI̍ dEvyudagAt̍ purastA̱t|viśvA# rUpAṇi# pratimOdamAnA|prajApa̍tiṃ̍ haviṣA# varddhayantI|priyA̍ dEvAnA-mupayAtu̍ yajñam||sOmO rAjA# mRugaśIra.ṣEṇa Agann|śivaM̍ nakṣatraM̍ priyamasya̍ dhAma|ApyAya̍mAnO̍ bahuqdhA janEṣu|rEta̍ḥ̍ prajAM ~MyajamAnE̍ dadhAtu

yat tE nakṣatraM̍ mRugaśIqra.ṣamasti|priyaṃ̍ rAjan̍ priyatamaM̍ priyAṇA̱m|tasmai# tE sOma haviṣA# vidhEma|śanna# Edhi dvipadE śaM catuṣpadE||ArdrayA̍# rudraḥ prathamAna̍ Eti|śrEṣṭhO# dEvAnAM patiraGniyAnA̱m|nakṣa̍tramasya̍ haviṣA# vidhEma|mA naḥ̍ prajAṃ rIriṣan̍ mOta vIrAn||hEtI rudrasya pariṇO̍ vRuṇaktu|ArdrA nakṣatraM̍ juṣatAṃ havirnaḥ|3̍ (10)

pramu~jcamAnau̍ duritAni viśvA̱|apAGaśaṃ# saM nudatAmarAtim||puna̍rnO̍ dEvyaditiḥ̍ spRuṇOtu|punarvasU̍ naḥ punarEtA̱M ~Myajñam|punarnO̍ dEvA aBiyantu̍ sarvE̱|punaḥ̍ punarvO haviṣA# yajAmaḥ||EvA na dEvyaditiranarvA|viśva̍sya̍ BartrI jagataḥ̍ pratiṣṭhA|punarvasU̍ haviṣA# varddhayantI|priyaM̍ dEvAnA-mapyEtu̍ pAthaḥ||4̍ (10)

bRuhaspatiḥ̍ prathamaM jAyamAnaḥ|tiṣya̍M̍ nakṣatramaBi̍ saMbaBUva|śrEṣṭhO̍# dEvAnAM pRutanAsu̍ jiṣṇuḥ|diśO&nu sarvA aBayannO̍ astu||tiṣyaḥ̍ purastAduta̍ maddhyatO̍ naḥ|bRuhaspati̍# rnaḥ paripAtu̍ paścAt|bAdhEtAn̍ dvEṣO aBayaM̍ kRuṇutAm|suvIryasya̍ patayaḥ̍ syAma||idaṃ sarpEByO# havirastu̍ juṣṭa̱m|AśrEṣA yEṣA-manuyanti̍ cEtaḥ|5̍ (10)

yE antarikṣaM̍ pRuthivIM kṣiyanti|tEna̍ḥ̍ sarpAsO havamAgamiṣṭhAḥ||yE̍ rOcanE̍ sUryasyApi# sarpAḥ|yE divaM̍ dEvImanu# sa~jcaranti|yEṣA̍mAśrEṣA̍ anuyanti̍ kAma̱m|tEByaḥ̍ sarpEByO madhumajjuhOmi||upa̍hUtAḥ̍ pitarO yE maGAsu|manO̍javasaḥ̍ sukRutaḥ̍ sukRutyAḥ|tE nO nakṣatrE̍ havamAgamiṣṭhAḥ|svadhABi̍# ryajñaM prayataM̍ juṣantAm

yE agnidagdhA̍ yE&nagni-dagdhAḥ|yE̍&muM̍ ~MlOkaM pitaraḥ̍ kṣiyanti|yAṅśca̍# vidmayAṃ u# ca na pravidma|maGAsu̍# yajñaṃ sukRutaM̍ juṣantAm||gavAM patiḥ PalgunInAmasi̍ tvam|tadaryaman̍ varuṇa mitra cAru|taM̍ tvA# vayaṃ sanitAraṃ̍# sanInAm|jIvA jIvantamupa̍ sam~MviśEma||yEnEmA̍ viśvA BuvanAni̍ sa~jjitA|yasya̍# dEvA anu̍ sam~Myanti cEtaḥ|7̍ (10)

aryamA rAjA&jarastuviṣmAn|Palgu̍nInA-mRuṣaBO̍ rOravIti||śrEṣṭhO̍# dEvAnA̱M BagavO BagAsi|tattvA# viduḥ PalgunIstasya̍# vittAt|asmaByaM̍ kṣatramajaraṃ# suvIrya̱m|gOmadaśva-vadupa-sannu̍dEha||BagO̍# ha dAtA Baga it pradAtA|BagO̍# dEvIḥ PalgunIrAvi̍vEśa|BagasyEttaM̍ prasavaM̍ gamEma|yatra̍# dEvaiḥ sadhamAda̍M̍ madEma

AyAtu̍ dEvaḥ savitOpa̍yAtu|hiraṇyayE̍na̍ suvRutA rathEna|vahanq.̍ hastaṃ# suBagaM̍ vidmanApasam|prayacCa̍ntaM̍ papuriM̍ puṇyamacCa||hastaḥ̍ prayacCa̍ tvamRutaM ~MvasIyaḥ|dakṣi̍ṇEna̍ pratigRuBṇIma̍ Enat|dAtAramadya̍ savitA̍ vidEya|yO̍ nO hastAya̍ prasuvAti# yajñam||tvaṣṭA nakṣatramaByE̍ti̍ citrAm|suBaṃ sasaM̍ ~Myuvatiṃ rOcamAnAm|9̍ (10)

nivEśaya-nnamRutAn̍ martyAṅśca|rUpAṇi̍# piṃqśan BuvanAni̍ viśvA̱||tannastvaṣṭA tadu# citrA vicaṣṭAm|tannakṣa̍traM̍ BUridA astu̍ mahya̱m|tannaḥ̍ prajAM ~MvIravatIṃ̍ sanOtu|gOBirnO̍ aśvaiḥ samanaktu̍ yajñam||vAyurnakṣatra-maByE̍ti̍ niṣṭyA̱m|tigmaśRu~ggO̍ vRuṣaBO rOruvAṇaḥ|samIrayan̍ BuvanA̍ mAtariśvA̱|apa dvEṣAṃsi̍ nudatAmarAtIḥ||10̍ (10)

tannO# vAyastadu niṣṭyA# śRuṇOtu|tannakṣatraM̍ BUridA astu̍ mahya̱m|tannO# dEvAsO anu# jAnantu kAma̱m|yathA tarEma̍ duritAni viśvA̱||dUramasmacCatravO̍ yantu BItAḥ|tadindrAgnI̍ kRuṇutAM̍ tad viśAKE|tannO̍# dEvA anumadantu̍ yajñam|paścAt purastA-daBayannO̍ astu||nakṣatrAṇA-madhi̍patnI̍ viśAKE|śrEṣṭhA̍vindrAgnI̍ Buvanasya̍ gOpau|11 (10)

viṣUcaḥ̍ śatrU-napabAdha̍mAnau|apa̍ kṣudhaM̍ nudatAmarAtim||pUrṇA̍ paścAduta pUrṇA purastA̱t|unmaddhyataḥ̍ pau̱rṇamAsI jigAya|tasyA̱M̍ dEvA adhi# sam~Mvasantaḥ|uttamE̍ nAka# iha mAdayantAm||pRuthvI̍ suvarcA# yuvatiḥ sajOṣA̱ḥ|paurṇamAsyudagA-cCOBa̍mAnA|ApyAyaya̍ntI̍ duritAni viśvA̱|uruM duhAM ~MyajamAnAya̍ yajñam ( )||12 (10) 3.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - yamanakṣatrAṇAM yAjyAnuvAkyAḥ

RuddhyAsma# havyair-namasOpa̍ sadya|mitraM̍ dEvaM mitradhEya̍nnO̍ astu|anUrAdhAn. haviṣA# varddhayantaḥ|śataM̍ jIvEma̍ śaradaḥ savIrAḥ||citraM̍ nakṣatra-muda̍gAt̍ purastA̱t|anUrAdhAsa iti yad vadanti|tanmitra̍ Eti̍ pathiBi# rdEvayAnai̱ḥ|hiraṇyayai rvitatai-rantari̍kṣE||indrO̱̍ jyEṣṭhAmanu nakṣatramEti|yasmi̍n̍ vRutraM ~MvRutra̍ tUryE# tatAra|13̍ (10)

tasmin̍ vayamamRutaM duhAnAḥ|kṣudha̍M̍ tarEma duritiM̍ duriṣṭim||purandarAya̍# vRuṣaBAya# dhRuṣṇavE̱|aṣAḍhAya̍ sahamAnAya̍ mIḍhuṣE̱|indrAya̍ jyEṣṭhA madhumad-duhA̍nA|uruM̍ kRuṇOtu̍ yajamAnAya̍ lOkam||mUlaM̍ prajAM ~MvIravatIM̍ ~MvidEya|parA̱cyEtu niṛRutiḥ̍ parAcA|gOBi rnakṣatraM̍ paśuBiḥ samaktam|aha̍rBUyAd-yaja̍mAnAya̍ mahya̱m

aharnO̍ adya suvitE̍ dadhAtu|mUlaM̍ nakṣatramiti̍ yad vadanti|parA̍cIM̍ ~MvAcA niṛRutiM̍ nudAmi|śivaM prajAyai# śivamastu̍ mahya̱m||yA divyA Apaḥ payasA̍ saM baBUvuḥ|yA antarikṣa̍ uta pArthivIryAḥ|yAsA̍maṣAḍhA̍ anuyanti̍ kAma̱m|tA na Apaḥ śaṅ syOnA Bavantu||yAśca̍ kUpyA yAśca# nAdyA̱ḥ samudriyA̱ḥ|yAśca# vaiśantIruta prAsacIryAḥ|15̍ (10)

yAsAmaṣAḍhA̍ madhu# Bakṣayanti|tA̍ na Apaḥ śaṅ syOnA Bavantu||tannO̍ viśvE upa# śRuṇvantu dEvAḥ|tadaṣAḍhA̍ aBi sam~Myantu̍ yajñam|tannakṣatraM̍ prathatAM paśuByaḥ|kRuṣir̍ vRuṣṭir yajamAnAya̍ kalpatAm||śuBrAḥ kanyA# yuvatayaḥ̍ supEśasaḥ|karmakRuta̍ḥ̍ sukRutO# vIryAvatIḥ|viśvA̱n̍ dEvAn. haviṣA# varddhayantIḥ|aṣAḍhAḥ̍ kAmamupayAntu̍ yajñam

yasmin brahmA&Byajayath̍ sarvamEtat|amu~jca̍# lOka midamUca̍ sarva̱m|tannO nakṣatramaBijid̍ vijitya|śriya̍M̍ dadhA-tvahRuṇIyamAnam||uBau̍ lOkau brahmaṇA̍ sa~jjitEmau|tannO̍ nakṣatramaBijid̍ vicaṣṭAm|tasmi̍n̍ vayaM pRutanAḥ̍ saM jayEma|tannO̍# dEvAsO anujAnantu̍ kAma̱m||śRuṇvanti# śrOṇA-mamRutasya̍ gOpAm|puṇyAmasyA̍ upaśRuṇOmi̍ vAca̱m|17 (10)

mahIM dEvIM ~MviṣṇupatnI-majUryAm|pratIcI̍mEnAṃ̍ haviṣA# yajAmaḥ||trEdhA viṣṇu-rurugAyO̍ vicakramE|mahIM̍ divaM̍ pRuthivI-mantarikṣam|tacCrOṇaiti̍ śrava# icCamAnA|puṇyaṅq̍ ślOkaM ~MyajamAnAya̍ kRuṇvatI||aṣṭau dEvA vasavaḥ̍ sOmyAsaḥ|cata̍srO̍ dEvI rajarAḥ śraviṣṭhAḥ|tE̍ yajñaM pA̱ntu rajasaḥ̍ parastA̱t|sam~MvathsarIṇa-mamRutaṅ̍# svasti

yajñaM naḥ̍ pAntu vasavaḥ̍ purastA̱t|dakṣiṇatO-&Biya̍ntu̍ śraviṣṭhAḥ|puṇyaM̍ nakṣatramaBi̍ sam~MviśAma|mA̍ nO arAti-raGaśaṃqsA̍ gann||kṣatrasya̍ rAjA varuṇO&dhirAjaḥ|nakṣa̍trAṇAṃ̍ śataBiṣag̍ vasiṣṭhaḥ|tau̍ dEvEByaḥ̍ kRuṇutO dIrGamAyuḥ|śataṃ̍ sahasrA# BEṣajAni# dhattaḥ||yajñannO rAjA varuṇa̍ upayAtu|tannO̍ viśvE# aBi sam~Myantu̍ dEvAḥ|19(10)

tannO nakṣatraṃ̍ śataBiṣag̍ juṣAṇam|dIrGamAyuḥ pratirad̍ BEṣajAni||aja̍ EkapAduda̍gAt̍ purastA̱t|viśvA# BUtAni# pratimOdamAnaḥ|tasya̍# dEvAḥ prasavaM̍ ~Myanti̍ sarvE̱|prOṣṭhapadAsO# amRutasya̍ gOpAḥ||viBrAjamAnaḥ̍ samidhAna ugraḥ|A&ntarikṣa-maruhada-gandyAm|taṃ̍ sUryaM̍ dEva-majamEkapAdam|prOṣṭhapadAsO̍ anuyanti̍ sarvE̱

ahir̍ buddhniyaḥ prathamAna̍ Eti|śrEṣṭhO# dEvAnAmuta̍ mAnuṣAṇAm|taM̍ brA̱hmaṇAḥ sOmapAḥ̍ sOmyAsaḥ|prOṣṭhapadAsO̍# aBi rakṣanti̍ sarvE̱||catvAra EkamaBi̍ karma# dEvAḥ|prOṣṭhapadAsa iti yAn. vadanti|tE̍ buddhaniyaM̍ pariṣadyaṅ# stuvantaḥ|ahiṃ̍# rakṣanti namasOpasadya̍||pUṣA̍ rEvatyanvEti̍ panthA̱m|puṣṭipatI# paśupA vAjabastyau|21̍ (10)

imAni# havyA prayatA̍ juṣAṇA|sugairnO yAnairupayAtAM̍ ~Myajñam||kṣudrAn paśUn rakṣatu̍ rEvatI# naḥ|gAvO# nO aśvAṃq anvEtu̍ pUṣA|annaṃq rakṣantau̍ bahuqdhA virUpam|vAjaṃ̍# sanutAM ~MyajamAnAya̍ yajñam||tadaśvinA-vaśvayujOpa̍yAtAm|śuBaM̍ gamiṣṭhau̍ suyamEBiraśvai̱ḥ|svaM̍ nakṣatraṃ̍ haviṣA yajantau|maddhvA̍ saMpRuktau̍ yajuṣA̍ samaktau||22̍ (10)

yau dEvAnA̱M Biṣajau# havyavAhau|viśvasya̍ dUtA-vamRutasya̍ gOpau|tau nakṣatraM̍ jujuṣAṇO-payAtAm|namO&śviByA̱M̍ kRuṇumO-&śvayugByA̱m||apa# pApmAnaM BaraṇIrBarantu|tad̍ yamO rAjA BagavAnq.̍ vicaṣṭAm|lOkasya̍ rAjA# mahatO mahAn. hi|sugaM naḥ panthAmaBayaM̍ kRuṇOtu||yasmin nakṣatrE̍ yama Eti rAjA̱|yasmi-nnEnamaByaṣi̍caMnta̍ dEvAḥ ( )|tadasya̍ citraṃ haviṣA# yajAma|apa# pApmAnaM BaraṇIr̍ Barantu||"nivEśanI̍ {1}" "yattE# dEvA adadhuḥ̍ {2}"||23 (13) (tatAra - mahyaM̍ - prAsacIryA - yA̱ntu yajñaM - ~MvAcaṅ# - svasti - dEvA-anu# yanti sarvE-vAjabastyau-sama̍ktau-dEvA̍ strIṇi# ca) (A2) 3.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - cAndramasAdInAM saptanAmiṣṭInAM yAjyAnuvAkyAḥ

"navO# navO Bavati jAyamAnO̍ {3]" "yamAdityA̍ aṃqśumA̱pyAyayanti̍ {4}"||yE virUpE̍ samanasA̍ sam~MvyayantI|samAnaM̍ tantuM̍ pari tAtanAtE̱|viBU praBU anuBU̍ viśvatO# huvE|tE nO nakṣatrE̍ havamAgamEtam||vayaM̍ dEvI brahmaṇA̍ sam~MvidAnAḥ|suratnAsO̍ dEvavItiM̍ dadhAnAḥ|ahOrAtrE̍ haviṣA# varddhayantaḥ|ati̍# pApmAna-matimuktyA̍ gamEma||pratyuvadRuśyAyatI|24̍ (10)

vyucCantI# duhitA divaḥ|apO mahI vRuṇutE̍ cakṣuṣA||tamO̍ jyOtiṣkRuṇOti̍ sUnarI̱|udustriyA̱ḥ sacatE sUryaḥ|sa̍ cA# udyannakṣatra-marcimat|tavEdu̍ṣO̍ vyuṣi sUryasya̍ ca||saM BaktEna# gamEmahi|tannO nakṣatra-marcimat|BAnumattEja̍# uccarat|upa̍# yajña-mihAgamat||25̍ (10)

pra nakṣatrAya̍ dEvAya|indrAyEnduṃ̍# havAmahE|sa naḥ̍ savitA suvath̍ sanim|puṣṭidAM ~MvIravattamam||"udutyaM̍ {5}" "citram {6}"||"aditirna̍ uruṣyatu {7}" "mahImUṣu mAtara̱m {8}||"idaM ~Mviṣṇuḥ{9}" "pratadviṣṇuḥ̍ {10]"||"agnirmUrddhA {11}" "Buvaḥ̍ {12}"||"anu# nO&dyAnumati̍ {13}" "ranvidanumatE̍ tvam {14}"||"havyavAhaṅq {15}" "sviṣṭam̍ {16}" ( )||26 (10) 3.1.4 anuvAkaM 4 - dEva nakṣatrEṣṭibrAhmaṇam

agnirvA akAmayata|annAdO̍ dEvAnAṅ# syAmiti|sa̍ EtamagnayE kRuttikAByaḥ̍ purOḍAśa-maṣṭAka̍pAlaM̍ niravapat|tatO̍ vai sO̱&nnAdO dEvAnAmaBavat|agnirvai̍ dEvAnAmannAdaḥ||yathA̍# ha vA agnir dEvanA-mannAdaḥ|Evaṃ̍ ha vA Eṣa manuṣyA̍ṇAM̍ Bavati|ya EtEna# haviṣA yajatE|ya̍ u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda||sO&tra̍# juhOti|agnayE svAhA kRuttikAByaḥ̍ svAhA̱|ambAyai svAhA# dulAyai svAhA̱|nitatnyai svAhA &Brayantyai̍ svAhA̱|mEGayantyai̍ svAhA# vara.ṣayantyai̍ svAhA̱|cupuṇIkAyai̍ svAhEti||27̍ (15)

prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata|tA̍ asmAth̍ sRuṣṭAḥ parAcIrAyann|tAsAṃ̍# rOhiṇI-maByaddhyAyat|sO̍&kAmayata|upa̍ mA&&vartEta|samE̍nayA̍ gacCEyEti|sa̍ EtaM prajApatayE̍ rOhiṇyai caruM niravapat|tatO̍ vai sA tamupAvartata|samE̍nayA̍ &gacCata||upa# ha vA EnaM̍ priyamAvartatE|saM̍ priyEṇa# gacCatE|ya EtEna# haviṣA yajatE|ya̍ u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda||sO&tra̍# juhOti|prajApatayE̍ svAhA# rOhiṇyai svAhA̱|rOcamAnAyai̍ svAhA̱ prajAByaḥ svAhEti||28̍ (16)

sOmO vA akAmayata|Oṣa̍dhInAṃ̍ rAjya-maBijayEyamiti̍|sa̍ Etaṃ sOmAya̍ mRugaśIra.ṣAya# śyAmAkaM caruM payasi̍ niravapat|tatO̍ vai sa OṣadhInAṃ̍ rAjyamaByajayat|samAnAnAṃ̍# ha vai rAjyamaBijayati|ya̍ EtEna# haviṣA yajatE|ya̍ u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|sO&tra̍# juhOti|sOmAya̍ svAhA# mRugaśIra.ṣAya svAhA̱|invakAByaḥ svAhauṣadhIByaḥ̍ svAhA̱|rAjyAya svAhA &Bijityai̍ svAhEti||29̍ (11)

rudrO vA akAmayata|paśumAnth̍ syAmiti|sa̍ Etaṃ rudrAyArdrAyai praiya~ggavaM̍ caruM payasi̍ niravapat|tatO̍ vai sa paśumAna̍Bavat|paśumAn.̍ ha vai Bavati|ya̍ EtEna# haviṣA yajatE|ya̍ u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|sO&tra̍# juhOti|rudrAya svAhA &&rdrAyai svAhA̱|pinvamAnAyai̍ svAhA# paśuByaḥ svAhEti||30̍ (10)

RukṣA vA iyamalOmakA̍&&sIt|sA&kA̍mayata|Oṣa̍dhIBir-vanaspati̍Biḥ̍ prajAyEyEti̍|saitamadi̍tyai̍ punarvasuByAM̍ caruM niravapat|tatO̍ vA iyamOṣadhIBir-vanaspati̍Biḥ̍ prAjAyata|prajA̍yatE̍ ha vai prajayA# paśuBiḥ|ya̍ EtEna# haviṣA yajatE|ya̍ u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|sO&tra̍# juhOti|adityai̍ svAhA punarvasuByAm|svAhA&&BU̱tyai̍ svAhA prajA̱tyai svAhEti||31̍ (11)

bRuhaspatirvA akAmayata|brahmavarcasI̍ syAmiti|sa̍ EtaM bRuhaspatayE̍ tiṣyAya̍ naivAraM caruM payasi̍ niravapat|tatO̍ vai sa brahmavarcasya̍Bavat|brahmavarcasI̍ ha vai Bavati|ya̍ EtEna# haviṣA yajatE|ya̍ u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|sO&tra̍# juhOti|bRuhaspatayE̍ svAhA# tiṣyAya̍ svAhA̱|brahmavarcasAya svAhEti||32̍ (10)

dEvAsurAḥ sam~MyattA̍ Asann|tE dEvAḥ sarpEBya# AśrEṣABya AjyE# karamBaM niravapann|tAnEtABi̍rEva̍ dEvatA-BirupA̍nayann|EtABi̍rha̍ vai dEvatABir-dviṣantaM̍ BrAtRuvya-mupa̍nayati|ya̍ EtEna# haviṣA yajatE|ya̍ u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|sO&tra̍# juhOti|sarpEByaḥ svAhA̱&&śrEṣAByaḥ svAhA̱|dandaśUkE̱Byaḥ svAhEti||33̍ (9)
